sentences.en: A racing car is an extraordinary feat of engineering.
sentences.cn: 赛车是工程学上一项相当了不起的成就。

sentences.en: Dancing on a rope is an acrobatic feat.
sentences.cn: 在纲丝绳上跳舞是一种特技

sentences.en: Dragging the fully laden boat across the sand dunes was no mean feat.
sentences.cn: 将满载货物的船拖过沙丘是一件了不起的事.

sentences.en: He performed a sensational acrobatic feat.
sentences.cn: 他表演了一套惊人的杂技功夫。

sentences.en: He received a medal for his heroic feat.
sentences.cn: 他因其英雄业绩而获得一枚勋章.

sentences.en: I was amazed to see his dangerous feat.
sentences.cn: 他的危险技艺让我感到惊讶.

sentences.en: Let me be honest with you - a feat which , by the way, I find of great difficulty.
sentences.cn: 让我对你讲老实话吧 - 顺便说一句, 这可是高难度的绝技.

sentences.en: The acrobat's feat took the audience's breath away.
sentences.cn: 杂技演员的惊险动作使观众为之咋舌.

sentences.en: The feat earned Skorzeny a hatful of medals.
sentences.cn: 由于这一功绩,斯科尔兹内获得了许多勋章.

sentences.en: The feat won them a prize of £85,000.
sentences.cn: 这一业绩为他们赢得了85,000英镑的奖金。

sentences.en: The name of the Russian astronaut who performed this feat was Leonov.
sentences.cn: 建立这一功绩的苏联宇航员名叫雷诺夫.

sentences.en: The tunnel is a brilliant feat of engineering.
sentences.cn: 这条隧道是工程方面的光辉业绩。

sentences.en: This prodigious feat of the preceding generation incited their sons to the utmost daring.
sentences.cn: 先辈的这种莫大的武功,激励着子孙们去作最大胆的尝试.

words.tran_cn: 特色，特征；容貌；特写或专题节目

trans.tran_en: something that is an impressive achievement, because it needs a lot of skill, strength etc to do
